item.title: It Depends
item.description: Don’t you hate it when you ask a perfectly good question, and someone comes back with the answer “it depends”? It’s so frustrating to think that in a world of ones and zeros, people can’t give absolute answers and you can’t rely on “best practice”. It’s an answer I’ve given so many times, especially when someone asks about performance.  Well, I’ve had my comeuppance.  The entire exercise of designing the new Java driver for MongoDB has been nothing but a series of questions where the answer is “it depends”:
